questions.text: What movie did Norm and his date go see?
questions.explanation:
Gandhi.

	Norm was separated from Vera at this time which was why he had a date with another woman. The movie "Gandhi" really did exist in 1983.

questions.text: Who was the sports reporter who came to the bar?
questions.explanation:
Dave.

	Dave was a friend from Sam's sports days. They use to chase women together.

questions.text: What did Coach reply when Sam said, "I'm having blackouts."?
questions.correct: "Kind of a nice break in the day."
questions.explanation:
"Kind of a nice break in the day."

	Sam said he was having blackouts as a way to get Diane off his back. Coach not knowing any better thought it must be a good thing.

questions.text: How long did Sam's friend say Sam and Diane had before they would break up?
questions.explanation:
24 hours.

	Sam said that they had never gone a whole day without fighting. He was concerned that Dave would indeed break them up.

questions.text: Why was Diane upset with Sam?
questions.correct: Sam still had his little black book.
options: Sam was hitting on another woman.
questions.explanation:
Sam still had his little black book.

	Diane wanted Sam to get rid of his black book. Sam offered to get rid of "x-z and all but one of q."

questions.text: What did Coach do to make sure he didn't lose his car keys?
questions.correct: locked his keys in the car
options: taped the key to his shoe
gave a neighbor a spare key
questions.explanation:
locked his keys in the car.

	When Carla asked him how he was going to get in he said, "I have a spare." Then he remembered he forgot the spare key. But then he said, "I left the windows down."

questions.text: Who called when Coach answered the phone?
questions.explanation:
No one.

	This was a very funny scene when Diane was talking and Coach answered the phone. Cliff told him the ringing was in his head. A little while later the phone really did ring. Someone asked Coach if he was going to answer it, and he replied, "It's in my head."

questions.text: Did Dave break up Sam and Diane?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He came very close; they were fighting a lot. However, Sam pointed out what a good thing he had with Diane and they stayed together.
